author: JetMETdqmval
body:
this PR fixes issues in running the unscheduled modes, similar to PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9938
In addition it includes all modifications in closed PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9079:
for JetMET DQM it enables MiniAOD monitoring, we add histograms to monitor MET resolutions and Jet response in Z+Jets final state
It is the 74X equivalent of previous 75X PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/9169
title: enable MiniAOD and ZJets monitoring in JetMET DQM,  fixes for unscheduled mode
